channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘We are an n of 1’: Palantir hails ‘incredible’ earnings as stock rockets nearly 8% after hours
item.description: Palantir looks into its all-seeing orb and sees full-year revenue between $7.18 billion and $7.2 billion.

item.title: Brendan Banfield Found Guilty in Virginia Double Murder Trial
item.description: Prosecutors said Brendan Banfield carried out an elaborate scheme using a fetish website in 2023 to kill his wife and another man.

item.title: Devon Energy CEO: ‘Stars align’ to acquire Coterra for nearly $26 billion as merger mania returns to the oilfield
item.description: The massive Permian Basin merger creates a combined Devon with a $58 billion enterprise value.

item.title: Trump Announces Initial Trade Deal With India, Cutting Tariffs to 18%
item.description: The agreement was short on details, but President Trump said India had promised to stop buying Russian oil and would buy more U.S. products for a redu...

item.title: Elon Musk Merges SpaceX With His A.I. Start-Up xAI
item.description: The deal further intermingles Mr. Musk’s companies and creates the most valuable private company on earth.

item.title: U.S. and Iranian Officials to Meet as Trump’s Threats Loom
item.description: President Trump’s Middle East envoy and his son-in-law were expected to meet Iran’s foreign minister in Istanbul on Friday amid tensions between the c...

item.title: If AI is roiling the job market, the data isn’t showing it, Yale Budget Lab report says, raising questions of ‘AI-washing’ to justify mass layoffs
item.description: Some analysts have projected AI will displace 7% of U.S. workers. Yale economists said it’s just too early to tell.

item.title: OpenAI launches Codex app to bring its coding models, which were used to build viral OpenClaw, to more users
item.description: OpenAI is locked in an increasingly intense battle with rival Anthropic over tools to create AI agents. The debut of the Codex app comes weeks after A...

item.title: Why Bitcoin is in a bear market: Analyst points to 3 factors after currency swoons below $75,000
item.description: The original cryptocurrency recovered slightly on Monday.

item.title: How a Conservative Texas District Rejected the Politics of Division
item.description: Many Americans are growing both exhausted and frightened by Trump’s scorched-earth, hyperpartisan, fire-ready-aim approach to the presidency.

item.title: U.S. and Iranian Officials to Meet as Trump’s Threats Loom
item.description: President Trump’s Middle East envoy and his son-in-law were expected to meet Iran’s foreign minister in Istanbul on Friday amid tensions between the c...

item.title: Trump Announces Initial Trade Deal With India, Cutting Tariffs to 18%
item.description: The agreement was short on details, but President Trump said India had promised to stop buying Russian oil and would buy more U.S. products for a redu...

item.title: Erfan Soltani, Who Reportedly Faced Death Sentence in Iran, Is Freed
item.description: Mr. Soltani, 26, was arrested last month as Iran brutally repressed anti-government demonstrations.

item.title: Uproar Over Meloni’s Face Painted on an Angel in a Church in Rome
item.description: The recent restoration of a chapel came with a surprise: an angel depicted with the likeness of Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni of Italy. Cue the protes...

item.title: Angel Restoration Resembles Italy’s Prime Minister
item.description: The face of an angel in a restored painting inside a chapel in Italy has many questioning its striking resemblance to Italy’s prime minister, Giorgia ...
